meanings.definition: The act of sending electronic messages over a computer network.
meanings.sent1: Emailing is a convenient way to communicate with others online.
meanings.sent2: I do a lot of emailing to keep in touch with my friends who live far away.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally sent an email to my dog while emailing my boss!
meanings.sent4: Her fingers danced across the keyboard, email after email, like a pianist playing a fast-paced piece.
meanings.sent5: The world of emailing is like a digital post office where messages zip through cyberspace.

meanings.definition: The practice of communicating with others through electronic mail.
meanings.sent1: Emailing has become a common way to stay connected in today's digital age.
meanings.sent2: My grandparents have embraced emailing to keep up with family news.
meanings.sent3: I once tried emailing my cat, but she never replied to my messages!
meanings.sent4: In the realm of communication, emailing is the messenger that bridges distances.
meanings.sent5: The art of emailing involves crafting words that travel through invisible wires to reach their destination.

meanings.definition: The process of composing and sending messages through email.
meanings.sent1: I find emailing to be a quick way to share information with my colleagues.
meanings.sent2: Emailing saves time compared to traditional mail delivery.
meanings.sent3: While emailing my friend, I accidentally attached a picture of my cat wearing sunglasses!
meanings.sent4: His mind worked like a well-oiled machine, drafting and emailing messages effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The efficiency of emailing is like a digital courier service, delivering messages at the speed of light.
